titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Allen A. Rubin law school notebook

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Allen A. Rubin law school notebook

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: Law School student at the University of Michigan from Chicago, earned his J.D. degree in 1939.
archdesc.scopecontent: Volumes of notes on Law School courses including constitutional law, contracts, evidence, judicial administration, torts, and property.
